### OffsetCache {#a7b57b33884ffb95baa982169cd5b0af8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void&#42; llvm::SourceMgr::SrcBuffer::OffsetCache = nullptr</>}
  labels = {["mutable"]}>
Vector of offsets into Buffer at which there are line-endings (lazily populated).

Once populated, the &#39;

&#39; that marks the end of line number N from &#91;1..&#93; is at Buffer&#91;OffsetCache&#91;N-1&#93;&#93;. Since these offsets are in sorted (ascending) order, they can be binary-searched for the first one after any given offset (eg. an offset corresponding to a particular <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smloc">SMLoc</a>).

Since we&#39;re storing offsets into relatively small files (often smaller than 2^8 or 2^16 bytes), we select the offset vector element type dynamically based on the size of Buffer.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h/#l00060">60</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/sourcemgr-h">SourceMgr.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
